title: SMS Virtual Assistant – Real Estate (Land Wholesaling) | Closify Offers Inc.
job_overview:
Are you quick, professional, and confident with written communication? Do you have excellent English and want to work with a U.S. real estate investment company that's growing fast?

Closify Offers Inc. is hiring a reliable SMS Virtual Assistant to join our land acquisition team. You'll be handling text conversations with property owners, screening potential leads, and setting appointments — all using our proven systems and templates.

This is a long-term opportunity with weekly pay, performance bonuses, and growth potential.

???? What You'll Be Doing:
Manage inbound and outbound SMS campaigns to landowners in the U.S.

Use scripts and templates to qualify seller leads

Respond quickly, professionally, and naturally in written English

Tag and organize leads based on their responses

Set follow-up tasks and notify teaUpgrade to see actual infombers of hot leads

Communicate daily with the team via chat/Zoom

???? Compensation:
$4.00/hour

36 hours+ a week

$5 bonus per qualified lead

0.5% commission on deals that close from your leads

Paid weekly (via Wise or PayPal)

? What We’re Looking For:
Excellent written English (grammar, tone, spelling)

Experience in SMS campaigns, chat support, or real estate preferred

Ability to follow instructions, scripts, and tag/track leads properly

Fast learner, detail-oriented, and responsive

Stable internet connection and full-time availability during U.S. daytime hours (EST preferred)

Real estate or wholesaling knowledge is a plus, but not required

???? How to Apply (Read Carefully):
Only applicants who follow ALL instructions will be considered.

Start your message with the keyword: “Text Titan”

Include a voice or video recording using Vocaroo, Loom, or any link

Introduce yourself

Share why you're a good fit for the role

?? No resume or long message needed — just the keyword + recording.

If we like what we hear, you’ll receive our official application form and next steps.

We’re looking for A-players who want to grow. If you're consistent, coachable, and ready to lock in a full-time, long-term role — apply now!
